snippet: Saudi Arabia has invited Iran’s foreign minister to visit, Saudi officials said Tuesday, a move that would hint at the possibility of a thaw between two bitter rivals.
abstract: Saudi Arabia invites Iran's Foreign Min Mohammad Javad Zarif to visit country, move that would hint at possibility of thaw between the two bitter rivals.
lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia has invited Iran’s foreign minister to visit, Saudi officials said Tuesday, a move that would hint at the possibility of a thaw between two bitter rivals.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: Iranian Defense Minister Is Invited
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: Iranian Defense Minister Is Invited
